content:
After the recent change with using tippy for reactions, the tooltip on hovering over a reaction appears beside it, to the right. I think earlier it appeared below it.
Having the reaction beside it is a bit problematic because it can overlap with-

  • Part of the message itself
  • Other reactions on that message which are to the right of current reaction
  • The "Add a reaction" symbol.

Here's an example of a message with a lot of reactions.
image.png

I think it would be better to have the tooltip below the reaction pill.
Fixed in 3823ed32e43f01b753b29e9b08ec5a2176a4cc22 as part of #17434, I think I missed something when I was testing this.
